SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.socket.client

Class ClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.socket.client.ClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNetworkHandler
public class ClientSocket extends Object implements ClientNetworkHandler
The class that handles the client socket connection

The class that handles the client socket connection and the communication with the server
It implements the ClientNetworkHandler interface
It uses a ClientMessageHandler to handle the messages received from the server
It uses a ClientGameSender to send the game messages to the server
It uses a ClientChatSender to send the chat messages to the server
It uses a ClientGameReceiver to receive the game messages from the server
It uses a ClientChatReceiver to receive the chat messages from the server
It uses a ClientExceptionReceiver to receive the exceptions from the server
It uses a PongHandler to handle the pong messages
It uses a ClientViewUpdater to update the client view
It uses a Socket to handle the connection
It uses a BufferedReader to read the messages from the server
It uses a PrintWriter to send the messages to the server
It uses a ExecutorService to run the client
It uses a boolean isRunning to check if the client is running
It uses a Logger to log the messages

    • close

      public void close()
      The method that closes the client socket connection

      It closes the client socket connection and the communication with the server
      It closes the ClientMessageHandler
      It closes the Socket
      It closes the BufferedReader
      It closes the PrintWriter
      It sets the isRunning to false

      Specified by:
      close in interface ClientNetworkHandler
